shortdesc.ph: The index of multi-quality video stream layers.

plentry.pd: (0): The layer_1 multi-quality video stream, with lower resolution and bitrate than STREAM_HIGH.
(0): The layer_1 video stream, with lower resolution and bitrate than STREAM_HIGH.
(1): The layer_2 multi-quality video stream, with lower resolution and bitrate than VIDEO_STREAM_LAYER_1.
(1): The layer_2 video stream, with lower resolution and bitrate than VIDEO_STREAM_LAYER_1.
(1): The layer_2 multi-quality video stream, with lower resolution and bitrate than STREAM_LAYER_1.
(2): The layer_3 multi-quality video stream, with lower resolution and bitrate than VIDEO_STREAM_LAYER_2.
(2): The layer_3 video stream, with lower resolution and bitrate than VIDEO_STREAM_LAYER_2.
(2): The layer_3 multi-quality video stream, with lower resolution and bitrate than STREAM_LAYER_2.
(3): The layer_4 multi-quality video stream, with lower resolution and bitrate than VIDEO_STREAM_LAYER_3.
(3): The layer_4 video stream, with lower resolution and bitrate than VIDEO_STREAM_LAYER_3.
(3): The layer_4 multi-quality video stream, with lower resolution and bitrate than STREAM_LAYER_3.
(4): The layer_5 multi-quality video stream, with lower resolution and bitrate than VIDEO_STREAM_LAYER_4.
(4): The layer_5 video stream, with lower resolution and bitrate than VIDEO_STREAM_LAYER_4.
(4): The layer_5 multi-quality video stream, with lower resolution and bitrate than STREAM_LAYER_4.
(5): The layer_6 multi-quality video stream, with lower resolution and bitrate than VIDEO_STREAM_LAYER_5.
(5): The layer_6 video stream, with lower resolution and bitrate than VIDEO_STREAM_LAYER_5.
(5): The layer_6 multi-quality video stream, with lower resolution and bitrate than STREAM_LAYER_5.
(6): The low-quality video stream, with the lowest resolution and bitrate.
(7): The maximum number of multi-quality video stream layers.
(7): The maximum number of video stream layers.
